subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Three games, three losses, two goals. The Lightning dropped to 0-6 away from home this season, but now it returns to St. Petersburg, where it was 5-0-1 entering Saturday night’s game.
snippet: Three games, three losses, two goals. The Lightning dropped to 0-6 away from home this season, but now it returns to St. Petersburg, where it was 5-0-1 entering Saturday night’s game.
